Plot: AbSIRd is a talk show starring Sir Anthony Spease, featuring co-hosts Kiyra Lynn, Bobbie Bullet and Thyrone Burton. The show highlights "abSIRd" videos, pictures, facts and guests. Filmed at the BiteSize TV glass studio in Hollywood.
Title: AbSIRd
Actors: Anthony Spease, Bobbie Bullet, Thyrone Burton, Kiyra Lynn
